title: Sales Performance Dashboard
description: A comprehensive Power BI dashboard tracking key sales metrics across regions, products, and time periods. Features interactive filters, drill-down capabilities, and executive KPI scorecards for real-time business intelligence.

title: Financial Analytics Suite
description: An enterprise Tableau workbook for financial analysis and forecasting. Includes P&L statements, cash flow visualizations, budget vs. actual comparisons, and predictive trend analysis with statistical modeling.

title: Budget Planning Workbook
description: A sophisticated Excel workbook with automated budget calculations, variance analysis, and multi-scenario planning. Features dynamic charts, conditional formatting, and integrated data validation for accurate financial planning.
